SOURCES.CON: CREATE TABLE CON (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, CONDI INT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.CUS: CREATE TABLE CUS (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(100),SURNAME VARCHAR(100), CARD_NUMBER INT,ID_NUMBER INT,STREET VARCHAR(100),STREET_NUMBER INT,BOOK_BORROWED VARCHAR(100),BOOK_BORROWED_ID INT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.LIB: CREATE TABLE LIB (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(100),AUTHOR_NAME VARCHAR(100), EDITION INT,YEAR INT,ISSN_ISBN VARCHAR(100),LIBRARY_ID INT,LOST TINYINT,HOLD TINYINT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.LIB11: CREATE TABLE LIB11 (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(100),AUTHOR_NAME VARCHAR(100), EDITION INT,YEAR INT,ISSN_ISBN VARCHAR(100),LIBRARY_ID INT,LOST TINYINT,HOLD TINYINT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.TEST3: CREATE TABLE TEST3 (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(100),AUTHOR_NAME VARCHAR(100), EDITION INT,YEAR INT,ISSN_ISBN VARCHAR(100),LIBRARY_ID INT,LOST TINYINT,HOLD TINYINT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
